About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

My career as a programmer began back in 1998, when I became interested in web page creation in a school computer science group. After leaving school in 2000, I entered the university in a specialty with a complex name, but related directly to programming and automation. After one year of successful training, I decided to pause and radically change the direction of my studies. As a result, I became an agronomist. Despite the fact that 20 years have passed after school, I again became interested in programming and now I am actively developing in this direction.

Right now I'm interested in...

HTML, CSS, SCSS

I have known html since school, but css is new for me. When creating this site, I used the SASS language for the first time, which turned out to be a very convenient tool when developing complex styles.

JAVASCRIPT

I started learning programming in JavaScript, as the most popular programming language. Definitely, I did not have time to learn all the possibilities, but I am constantly improving my skills and I succeed in doing something.

REACT.JS

React is one of the most powerful technologies in web development today, this cause I am started studying it and have already tried to write my first project using React.
